title: More McGirt Fallout: The Case of the White Supremacist Choctaw
sub_head: Which criminals, precisely, get to use the Supreme Court escape hatch?
body:
The Supreme Court created a legal mess with its misbegotten 5-4 McGirt ruling in 2020, and the complications keep coming. Consider the legal escape hatch for Native American criminals in Oklahoma, and the problem of defining who counts as Native.
Robert Wadkins received 40 years in prison for rape and kidnapping. Heâ€™s 3/16 Choctaw by blood but became a tribal member only after his conviction. He spent nine previous years in a white-supremacist prison gang, the Universal Aryan Brotherhood.
